octeon_poll_ops_t Struct Reference

#include <cavium_kernel_defs.h>

Detailed Description

Structure passed by kernel application when registering a poll function with the driver.

Definition at line 189 of file cavium_kernel_defs.h.

Data Fields

octeon_poll_fn_t fn
 Pointer to Poll function to be called by the poll thread.
unsigned long fn_arg
 The function argument to be passed to the poll function when it is scheduled by the poll thread.
int ticks
 The scheduling interval in timer ticks that the poll function should be scheduled by the poll thread.
char name [80]
 A character string to identify this poll function.
uint32_t rsvd
 Reserved for Driver use.
